reviewText: I love this movie and can keep watching it, even though it's kind of sad. It's a very good movie, and will have to buy it again!! :)
Best movie I've seen in awhile!
Great Movie, I recommend this for everyone
This movie is fantastic! Very heart-warming and a tear-jerker at the same time. Great acting and a story that will touch your heart and make you cry.

The movie was fairly accurate compared to James Patterson's book by the same name. It was also a great price. If you are a James Patterson or Christina Applegate fan I would recommend picking this up.

Very touching movie. If I read a book then see the movie I usually like the book way more, however this is a case that I would have to say I can't decide which is better...the book or movie. I would say you can't go wrong with the movie or book.

I loved this movie.  I had been trying to rent it for a long time at our local video store and they only one copy, which was always out.  Then one day I asked about it and they said they didn't have it anymore.  Well, Amazon did, so I bought it and I loved it.  Now I can watch it anytime I want.
